articles.description: AI is all the buzzword nowadays and many tech companies and industry experts are trying to kickstart the AI journey in India The going at least according to one ex-Googler is tough and the future of AI bleak
articles.content: At a time when different tech companies, tech experts, startup gurus, venture capitalists and tech industry insiders are trying to kickstart an AI revolution in India, comments by an ex-Googler came … [+5834 chars]

articles.title: Volkswagen Won’t Offer A Sub-4m SUV In India, To Focus On Premium Models - CarDekho
